'''Master Zhang's Metal Mission''' is a weekly [[Reputation Request]] that occurs in [[Liyue]].

==Step==
# Give ten [[Iron Chunk]]s to [[Master Zhang]]

==Request Details==
Help Needed:<br />
We've had more and more customers lately, and we're running out of Iron Chunks.<br />
The influx of customers has also robbed me of any spare time with which to purchase more...<br />
If there's some helpful soul out there who could gather {{Color|buzzword|ten Iron Chunks}} for me, I would be in your debt.

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Master Zhang:''' Need to buy a weapon? Or have one custom-built? Repairs are free, just let me know if you come across any prize ore.
:{{DIcon|Quest}} About Iron Chunks...
::'''Master Zhang:''' Yes, that's my commission. I'm all out of Iron Chunks here.
::'''Master Zhang:''' Well, have you brought me ten Iron Chunks?
::{{DIcon|Quest}} Here they are.
:::'''Master Zhang:''' Hmm... These Iron Chunks should be enough, for now...
:::'''Master Zhang:''' These are for you. Thanks for the help.
::{{DIcon|Quest}} Not yet.
:::'''Master Zhang:''' I see. Well be sure to get me those Iron Chunks as soon as you've got them, the fire's hot and customers are waiting.
{{Dialogue end}}
